item.title: CVE-2024-29139|2024-06-04T17:57:00.283Z -- mark%20tilly -- mycurator%20content%20curation
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Mark Tilly MyCurator Content Curation allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects MyCurator Content Curation: from n/a through 3.76.
